#MOV R0 0x64
#0x01 100 364
01100364

#MOV R1 0x32
#0x01 101 332
01101332

#ADD R0 R1  //100 + 50 = 150
#0x02 100 101
02100101

#ADD R2 0x32 // 50
#0x02 102 332
02102332

#MOV R3 0x19 // 25
#0x01 103 319
01103319

#SUB R0 R1 // 150 - 50 = 100
#0X03 100 101
03100101

#SUB R2 R3 // 50 - 25 = 25
#0X03 102 103
03102103
